statements: UPDATE supporters SET age = 30, interests = 'Music, Books' WHERE supporter_id = 1;
UPDATE supporters SET gender = 'Female', location = 'New York' WHERE supporter_id = 2;
UPDATE supporters SET age=30, gender='F', engagement_level='High' WHERE supporter_id=1;
UPDATE supporters SET first_name='John', email='john@example.com', location='New York', interests='Sports, Hiking' WHERE supporter_id=2;
UPDATE supporters SET supporter_name = 'John Doe', engagement_level = 5 WHERE supporter_id = 1;
UPDATE communications SET content = 'New content!', communication_date = '2022-01-10' WHERE comm_id = 3;
UPDATE supporters SET engagement_level = 3, supporter_name = 'Jane Doe' WHERE supporter_id = 1;
UPDATE communications SET content = 'New content for communication' WHERE comm_id = 5;
UPDATE supporters_demographics SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE supporter_id = 12345;
UPDATE supporters_interests SET level_of_interest = 5, hobby = 'Gardening' WHERE supporter_id = 54321;
